data.name: 魂之乡
data.detailed_description:
Fight, explore, build!
There are many things you can do in this vast open world.
Build your weapons and fight all kinds of monsters! Go to ancient ruins to find what you need.
Collect the resources you need.
Build houses, towns, and run your territory.
Form a guild with like-minded people to attract more residents!
characteristic:
- Multi person online / online / single person
- Open world exploration
- Sandbox
- Manage
- ARPG action role play
data.about_the_game:
Fight, explore, build!
There are many things you can do in this vast open world.
Build your weapons and fight all kinds of monsters! Go to ancient ruins to find what you need.
Collect the resources you need.
Build houses, towns, and run your territory.
Form a guild with like-minded people to attract more residents!
characteristic:
- Multi person online / online / single person
- Open world exploration
- Sandbox
- Manage
- ARPG action role play
data.short_description: This is an open world multiplayer RPG game. You can do anything in this vast world. Explore, fight, trade, build, cook, keep pets, solve puzzles, and study magic!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 / 7 / 8
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3090
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
